articles.title: ‘Richest kid in America’ flaunts lifestyle - news.com.au
articles.description: Three of America’s richest “self-made” teenagers are giving viewers an inside peek into their luxurious lives in new TV series Bling Life.
articles.content: Donald Dougher, 15, calls himself The Richest Kid in America and is estimated to be worth between $900,000 and $1.2 million.Three of America’s richest “self-made” teenagers are giving viewers an insi… [+8320 chars]
